div.p:
Curia gilde tenta In pretorio burgj de Abirdene' die veneris octauo
die mensis Octobris per gilbertum menyeis et Andream Cullane decanos gilde
Anno Domini Millesimo Quingentesimo Primo

div.head: Gustatores seruicie
div.p:
Evin Quarter
Johannes Cuk sergeandus Thomas Riddaile phillippus Clerk

Crukat quarter
Andreas nachtj sergeandis Jacobus Crukschank Alexander Ramsay

ffuty quarter
Willelmus scrimgeour sergeandus Alexander Stablar gilbertus Tulideff

Grene quarter
gilbertus Tulideff sergeandis gilbertus Paule Duncanus Ross'

The said day thome Philp grantit him awand to thome
lamyntoune tuentj schillingis for ane barrell of ter quhilkis the
baillies chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day thome lammynton' grantit he hed' sellit j barrell
of tar' to thome philp quhilk he sald' warand' him

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die
mensis Octobris Anno quosupra

The said day bollekin skipper of the Campveris grantit him tile haue
Ressauit fra Johnne' fechat in the name of Androw Cantuly xv schillingis
for thre chandelaris an for the fraucht of half ane barrell of saip

The said day the baillies chargit Johnne' Crukschank as procuratour for
his fadir thome of meldrum to freitht and Releif Alexander King of ane
merk of annuell of the forland of Donald strachin quhilk Canny charteris
Duelt In or he past furtht of the tolbutht

The said day Johnn' the Waus in amerciament of the Court be ane
suorne assis' Williame murray forspekar for the wrangwis' withhalding
of aucht schillingis fra Alexander malison' quhilkis the baillies chargeit
him to pay within terme of law

The said day Alexander Andersone' was maid quyt be ane suorne' assis'
Williame murray forspekar of tua franche crownis clamit him be tho
mas Narne allegeand that he had changit thame becaus' It was Referrit
to the said alexandris aitht quhilk aitht he maid in Jugment

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquinto
die mensis octobris anno quosupra

The saide day Johne Wormet with William blinsele his forspekar com
plenit and exponit to the Alderman and ballies that his forland in the
Castalgat was gretlie skathit be Alexander prat tennand'
of the Inland throw Ischen and Entre at his foryet becaus' the
said' yet was nocht tentaly kepit as efferit beseking the Alder
man and ballies to caus' the said Alexander to kep the said yet
quharthrou his said land may be skaith'les in tyme cumin or
ellis that he micht tak done his said yet And the Alderman
and baillies with awis' of the Court ordanit the saide Alexander
to kep the said yet quharthroue the said Johnis ye land be
skath'les in tyme tocum and failyeing tharof thai licent
the said Johne to tak of the said yet

The said day the Alderman and baillies assignit tuysday that nixt
cumis that hew mertsone had Intromettit and tane fra him sex stanis
of woll of thome Riddaillis for Williame buchanis dettis

The saide day It was diuisit and ordanit be the aldirman ballieis
and' counsell present for the tyme that thar be fyve stane
of wax maid' in torchis and prekatis j dusane li' of scorcheatis
And' the wynis of euere taverne best fressast mast plesand'
and conuenent be providit bocht and outred' to be gevin tile our'
Souerane lordis hienes in ane propine now at his her' cumin
passand' to the Justice ayris of Inuernes et cetera Ande thar wynis
to be assignit tile our Souerane lordis factouris quhar' it ples'
thame best of quhat tavernys and of quhat kyne wynis
to resaue at thar' plesour becaus' the wynis coud' nocht be gottin
in gret to be gevin in ane propin to his heines Ande to
pay this propin of the common' gudis of the tovne

the said' day Allane litstar was chosin dekyne of the litstaris
be the craft and Suorne and' admittit be the aldirman
and consale to se and consider the faltis of the craft and present
the Samyn to the aldirman and balyeis Induringe the tovnis Will

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis Octobris anno quo Supra

the said' day It was sufficientlie preuit be Robert crag and
mathow branche that hew mertysone causit ane skouterknap
tile Arrest sex peter of woll pertening to thome Ridall for
William buchannis dettis and tuk the said' woll fra alexander
prat in the campueris quhen it was cumand' to the schipe
hamuart in scotland' for the quhilkis wol William Adrianson'
skippar of the said' hevis schip and factouris to his gudis was arrestit
and persevit be law And' thareftir it wes decretit and ordanit
that the said' skippar suld' fynd' Souerte in this burghe to pay
and deliuer the said' woll to the said' thomas procuratouris or factouris
in the campuer' gif It be vnsellit now at the ourpassinge
of the said' Schip And gif the said' woll be sellit to
pay him alsmekle' in Abirdene as siclik woll gef beyond'
at the hame cumin of the next Schip And the saide skippar
fand' Robert crag Souerte to fulfill this ak and he vand' him
to freithe him tharanent

Burgenses et fratres gilde burgi de Abirdene Recepti tempore
prepositure Alexandri menyeis Anno Domini Mmo quingentesimo primo

Andreas Sratone Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde pro quinque marcis
Inde solut' xl s' et due marce sibi remittitur quia Sponsavit filiam Jacobi
Crag burgensis prestito Solito Juramento de consensu Consilij et Inde solut' v s' preposito
Cuj Inuictum fuit terram Infra hunc burgum pro amerciamento Regis distringibilem in alba bursa
infra annum et diem habere

Willelmus King Allutarius Receptus in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit
filiam burgensem prestito solito Juramento et solut' vj s' et vj s' soluet
in festo pentecostes proximo futuro

Willelmus loremar' Recipitur in liberum burgensem quia Sponsauit filiam
burgensis et Soluit sex s' et alios vj s' soluet ad festum pentecostes
proximum futurum prestito Solito Juramento

Walterus Allansone alias Sayfray Recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde quia Sponsauit filiam burgensis et excercuit diligenciam
suam tempore pestilencie infra burgum

Patricius leslie Jure paterno Recipitur in liberum / burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa ut moris est

Duncanus gilrutht recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam
burgensis et Soluit xx s' et decim quinque s' in alba bursa soluendo preposito prestito
Solito Juramento

georgeus fentone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
ac inuenit prepositum et Alexandrum plegio pro

Willelmus Johnsone textor Jure paternitatis Recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento

Johannes corning textor Recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento
Ac Soluet decano gilde xiij s' et iiij ' in festo pentecostes proximo futuro S

Alexander malison' Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
v s' in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Alexander Kintor filius David Kintor Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Normandus leslie Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
Solito Juramento et Solut v s' in alba bursa

y colp Jure paterno Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
S Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Alexander Ramsay allutarius recipitur in liberum burgensem Jure paternitatis
et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Thomas Ridale Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsa
uit filiam burgensem prestito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Alexander moreson' Recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam burgensem prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Archebaldus Wobster recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsauit filiam burgensem
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut v s' in alba bursa
